com.example.charles.opencv.Database

Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
      • com.example.charles.opencv.Database.Database

  • public class Database
extends android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
    This class is a helper for interfacing with the sql database.

      • getBird

        public Bird getBird(int birdID)
        Retrieve the bird attached to the BirdID. If bird does not exists, returns null
        Parameters:
        birdID - BirdID of the selected bird
        Returns:
        Bird matching the BirdID

      • getBirdIDs

      • updateBirdIDs

        public void updateBirdIDs(int goalFeature,
                          java.lang.String feature,
                          java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> birdIDs)
        Updates the List of Integers containing the IDs of all birds matching the goal feature
        Parameters:
        goalFeature - FeatureOption containing the goal bird feature
        feature - Feature name
        birdIDs - List of BirdIDs to refine search

      • getListFeatures

        birdIDs - List of BirdIDs
        Returns:

      • getListQuestions

        Retrieve the list of feature tables and their associated questions
        Returns:
        List of Questions containing the table name and question

      • getBestOption

        public Question getBestOption(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> birdIDs,
                              java.util.List<Question> questions)
        Determine the best question to ask
        Parameters:
        birdIDs - List of BirdID's
        questions - List of Questions
        Returns:
        Most optimal question to reduce the number of BirdID's

      • getClosestBirds

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getClosestBirds(java.util.List<Question> questions,
                                                         java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> answers,
                                                         java.lang.Integer wrongBirdID)
        Get a list of at most 5 birds closest in attributes to the wrong bird
        Parameters:
        questions - List of Questions Asked
        answers - List of Answers to the Questions Asked
        wrongBirdID - ID of the Bird which has been Identified as Incorrect by the User
        Returns:
        List of at most 5 birdIDs matching closest to the bird

      • getSimilarBirds

        private java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getSimilarBirds(java.util.List<Question> questions,
                                                          java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.Integer>> birdMatches)
        Get a list of birds that match all but one question is the list of questions
        Parameters:
        questions - List of Questions Asked
        birdMatches - List of Birds which are Linked to each Question
        Returns:
        List of birdIDs matching all but one question

      • getMatchingBirdIDs

        private java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.Integer>> getMatchingBirdIDs(java.util.List<Question> questions,
                                                                             java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> answers,
                                                                             java.lang.Integer wrongBirdID)
        Returns a list containing a list of all birdIDs matching the answer of one of the questions
        Parameters:
        questions - List of Questions to Match Against
        answers - List of Answers to the Questions
        wrongBirdID - ID of the Bird which has been Identified as Incorrect by the User

      • listIDs

        private java.lang.String listIDs(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> birdIDs)
        Returns the List of birdIDs for use in the SQL statement VALUES
        Parameters:
        birdIDs - List of BirdIDs
        Returns:
        String containing all the birdID's formatted for the SQL VALUES statement
